title: Is Daniel Z. a Anti Semitic?
body:
Well after reviewing the insult Sea Lion I have come to the conclusion that Daniel Z. is Anti Semitic, calling someone a Sea Lion is also a term used to insult jews. I have proof

sealion
another word for someone jewish, especially for jews who are extremely aggressive and rude
happy hanukah sealion
by iiampotato June 14, 2016

Here is my reference I got it from 
https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=sea%20lion
